name: Lightning Luther
description:
Play as Martin Luther and help spread the word of the Protestant Reformation by posting Martin Luther's Ninety-five Theses onto Church doors. Be careful though, it was once said that while Martin Luther was walking about, he was almost struck by lightning. After almost being struck by lightning Martin Luther chose to become a monk, and this eventually led to a major reform of the medieval church.

As you play through the game you will get to read Martin Luther's Nintey-five Theses, and have a fun time doing it!

Special thanks to:
Coalition of Lutherans Advancing in Mission (CLAIM) 
Thrivent Financial for Lutherans
Calvary Lutheran Church of Mt. Airy, MD

*All proceeds go to the Lutheran Disaster Relief
